name: sqcn
body: |- wcel(cmpt(s0, cc, co(cv(s0), cexp, nat2)), co(c0, ccn, c0))

comment: The square function on complex numbers is continuous. (Contributed by NM, 13-Jun-2007.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 5-May-2014.)
